User-agent: *
Allow: /

Disallow: /api/*
Disallow: /404

# Sitemap locations
# Static pages (generated by @astrojs/sitemap at build time)
Sitemap: https://kowalah.com/sitemap-index.xml
# Dynamic pages from Sanity CMS (blog posts, categories, webinars)
Sitemap: https://kowalah.com/sitemap-dynamic.xml

# LLM context files
# See https://llmstxt.org/
LLMsTxt: https://kowalah.com/llms.txt
